resources.textures

Class StaticTexture2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • resources.textures.AbstractTexture
      • resources.textures.StaticTexture
        • resources.textures.StaticTexture2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource, ChangableColorSpace, EasyFiltering, Texture, Texture2D

    public class StaticTexture2D
extends StaticTexture
implements Texture2D
    Stores data about a loaded texture. You can load a texture only once, if you try to load it twice, you get reference to the already loaded one.
    See Also:
    loadTexture(File path, boolean sRgb)
